posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: Smores
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:40990709
Reason: I killed myself in front of a prisoner and i didn't realize i had a gun in my hand. Although i do agree that it is gunplanting, it wasn't my intention, i was just playing around.
What server were you playing?: [NNJG] Jailbreak
Who blacklisted you?:Maguroni
Why should we unblacklist you?:Because it honestly wan't my intention to gunplant. I am on the server almost every day and enjoy being a guard, so the fact that i was blacklisted for an accidental gunplant kind of killed the game for me. I do not have anything against maguroni. Im simply stating that i wasn't trying to inhibit gameplay at all, i was just trying to have fun.
i was in the match when he got blacklisted, and i didnt really notice it as a "gun plant" so i +support him getting unblacklisted. :)
+Support I didn't Noticed a Gun plant Either When he Died He dropped the Gun Dont you always Drop Stuff When you die?
I accept this request or whatever.  I just really hate gunplanting. So ask someone to unblacklist you.
he was today. so plz lock.
